comments: Surgeon with 37th Regiment in Gibraltar 1799, West Indies 1799-1809, Madagascar & Mauritius 1812-1816, Ireland 1816-1835, N.S.W. Australia 1836-1844
examples: Piper quadrangulare J.V.Thomps. Trans. Linn. Soc. London 9: 202 (1808)
isoCountries: Ireland, Madagascar, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Mauritius, Australia, Gibraltar
source: IK. R.Desmond, Dict. Brit. & Irish Bot. & Hort. (1994).
